original_text: The clans of Judah came forward, and the Zerahites were chosen. He had the clan of the Zerahites come forward by families, and Zimri was chosen.
korean_text: 유다 족속을 가까이 나아오게 하였더니 세라 족속이 뽑혔고 세라 족속의 각 남자를 가까이 나아오게 하였더니 삽디가 뽑혔고

sentences.original_text: The clans of Judah came forward,
He had the clan of the Zerahites come forward by families,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 세라 사람들의 가문을 가족별로 나아오게 했고,
